import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get model counts by category with filters"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/for/category/{CategoryId}/counts"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves model counts grouped by various dimensions for a specific category with optional filtering.

**Prerequisites**
- **CategoryId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/categories/v2](/docs/api/categories/search-categories-v-2)

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/models/for/category/\{CategoryId\}/counts](/docs/api/models/get-model-counts-by-category-get) - Simple GET version

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"CategoryId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the category.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchCategoriesV2","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/categories/v2","responseField":"Items[].CategoryId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
